about.title: About VioTech Pro
about.description: We transform companies with premium technology. Over 5 years helping SMEs and companies in Colombia scale without technical limits.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Accelerate the growth of Colombian companies by eliminating technical barriers. We offer strategic consulting, premium software development and cloud infrastructure that allows our clients to compete globally.

results.title: Results-focused
results.description: Every project has clear and measurable objectives. We focus on delivering real value.

speed.title: Speed without sacrificing quality
speed.description: Fast time-to-market with clean code, solid architecture and best practices.

security.title: Security first
security.description: Compliance, audits and enterprise protocols from day one.

global.title: Global thinking
global.description: Architectures that scale internationally, designed for the global market.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Experts in technology, design and strategy

multidisciplinary.title: Multidisciplinary Team
multidisciplinary.description: UX Designers, Tech Leads, QA Engineers, SREs and Product Managers working together
multidisciplinary.detail: We have a hybrid team distributed between Colombia and LATAM, specialized in different areas but united by a common goal: deliver world-class technological solutions.

smdVital.challenge: Outdated patient management system and manual processes
smdVital.solution: Comprehensive web platform with appointment management, digital medical records and real-time analytical dashboard

medicExpress.challenge: Lack of delivery visibility and poor customer communication
medicExpress.solution: Mobile app with real-time tracking, automatic notifications and integrated inventory management system

techShop.challenge: Slow website and low conversion rate
techShop.solution: Complete redesign with Next.js, performance optimization and simplified checkout with local payment gateways

financiaYa.challenge: Loan platform with scalability and security issues
financiaYa.solution: Cloud-native architecture, banking security implementation and automated scoring system

asistente.tip2: Mention the impact on your work or business to prioritize correctly.
asistente.tip3: Include steps to reproduce the problem if it's a technical error.
